:defaultValue.description: The value of the combobox when initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control the state of the Combobox

modelValue.description: The controlled value of the Combobox Should be binded-with with v-model.

defaultOpen.description: The open state of the combobox when it is initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control its open state.

open.description: The controlled open state of the Combobox Must be binded-with with v-model.

searchTerm.description: The controlled search term of the Combobox Should be binded-with with v-model:searchTerm.

:filterFunction.description: The custom filter function for filtering ComboboxItem.

multiple.description: Whether multiple options can be selected or not.

dir.description: The reading direction of the combobox when applicable. If omitted, inherits globally from DirectionProvider or assumes LTR (left-to-right) reading mode.

name.description: The name of the Combobox Submitted with its owning form as part of a name/value pair.

disabled.description: When true, prevents the user from interacting with Combobox
